title: Lalpa I hnathawh hi
lyrics:
Lalpa I hnathawh hi
Rawn tiharh fo vang che
I tirhkohten I theihnain
Khawvel chhandam rawh se

I hnathawh tiharh rawh
Tunah kan ngen a che
Aw Lalpa Nangin min pawl la
Mal min sawmsak ang che

Lalpa I hnathawhah
I hming tiropui la
Mi thinlungah I hmangaihna
Rawn chhem alh fo vang che

Lalpa I hnathawh hian
I thu malsawmsak la
A thianghlimzia leh a felna
Hriat fiah theihna turin

Lalpa I hnathawhah
Malsawm ruah surtir la
Ropuina hi Nangma tan cha uh
Keini tan malsawmna
